entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
